# Draft:SCADA Software

| products = SCADA Software,  Calibration Software
}}
LAquis SCADA Software
LAquis SCADA is the SCADA software.
Multiple drivers examples: MODBUS (TCP or RTU), Alnet, Advantech, DF1, Omron, MQTT, etc...
Create pages, tags, formulas, scripts, many other options, databases, automatic reports and webs.
References
